title: Generate clear resin headstone mold image with flowers, grass, and Yorkie portrait for Ponce

requirements.summary: Generate a new headstone mold product image showing a clear resin headstone shape with flowers and green grass elements embedded inside, and a male Yorkie dog portrait displayed inside a black square frame centered on the headstone
acceptanceCriteria: The headstone mold image depicts a clear/transparent resin headstone shape
Flowers and green grass are visibly embedded within the resin
A male Yorkie dog portrait is centered on the headstone inside a solid black square frame
The image is used in the Headstone card within ShapeShowcases.tsx

file_operations.description: Generate a photorealistic product image of a clear transparent resin headstone mold with colorful embedded flowers (roses, daisies) and green grass blades, featuring a centered male Yorkshire Terrier (Yorkie) dog portrait inside a solid black square frame on the face of the headstone. The image must be 800x900 pixels and saved at this exact workspace path for use as a static asset in the ShapeShowcases component.

requirements.summary: Update the Headstone shape card in ShapeShowcases.tsx to render the newly generated clear resin headstone mold image as its showcase photo
acceptanceCriteria: The Headstone card in ShapeShowcases.tsx displays the new ponce-headstone-mold image
No other shape cards are affected

file_operations.description: Update the Headstone shape card image source to reference the newly generated ponce-headstone-mold.dim_800x900.png file. Change the image path for the Headstone card only, using the workspace path frontend/public/assets/generated/ponce-headstone-mold.dim_800x900.png. Keep all other shape cards (Square, Heart, Hexagon) unchanged. Ensure the image renders properly with appropriate alt text describing the clear resin headstone with flowers, grass, and Yorkie portrait.
